metadata.title: CVE-2023-52812 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd: check num of link levels when update pcie param In SR-IOVenvironment, the value of pcie_table->num_of_link_levels will be 0, andnum_of_levels - 1 will cause array index out of bounds

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
